description:
Field sales powers the economy — but most teams are flying blind. Reps lack coaching and are buried in admin work, managers are stretched thin, and leaders can’t see what’s really happening in the field.

Siro is the intelligent sales companion redefining how field teams learn, perform, and win.

We capture and analyze millions of in-person sales conversations, integrating deeply with tools like Salesforce to automate workflows, surface insights, and boost performance across the org -- think Iron Man’s Jarvis for sales.

We are backed by Index, Fika, CRV, and SignalFire, and trusted by leading home-improvement, retail, distribution, and automotive brands.

funding.investors: SignalFire, with participation from 01 Advisors, StepStone Group, CRV, Fika Ventures, and Index Ventures
funding.raw: Siro, an AI-powered conversation intelligence platform for in-person sales, secured $50 million in a Series B funding round on May 21, 2025. The round was led by SignalFire, with participation from 01 Advisors, StepStone Group, CRV, Fika Ventures, and Index Ventures. This funding brings Siro's total raised to $75 million and will be used to accelerate product development and expand its team.

recent_news: Siro has been actively expanding and securing investment. In terms of market expansion, the brand made its European debut with the opening of SIRO Boka Place in Porto Montenegro in May 2025. Subsequently, SIRO announced its first US hotel and branded residences, SIRO Brickell, Miami, with an expected opening in 2030, with announcements made in October and December 2025. The company also has a pipeline for future properties in Mexico, Saudi Arabia, and Tokyo, with Kerzner International noted as a key partner in this growth. Financially, Siro secured Series B funding led by SignalFire, aimed at enhancing its field sales capabilities with AI. In terms of partnerships, Siro announced a collaboration with Salesforce to leverage field sales conversation data. A social media post in August 2025 also highlighted Siro's brand focus on recovery, training, and sleep.
